text: Agek, bɨawl ne ak nop pen agɨnɨgab, Nad bɨ wog gɨñeb tɨmel ak mɨdeban, bɨ yɨlɨk gep olap agɨnɨgab agak. Yad binɨb tap wog yɨbal okok, kɨles gɨl nep taw pɨlɨg ñɨbin agɨnɨgab agak. Binɨb wog day kɨli okok tap yɨŋ yokɨnɨgabal, tap anɨb ak jakek yad ke dɨpin agak. Anɨb okok nad nepan agɨnɨgab agak.
